property.name: rpc.client.timeout
property.description: The timeout interval, in milliseconds, of a RPC invocation. The default is 3600000 (1 hour).

property.name: rpc.client.connect.tcpnodelay
property.description: Determines whether to set socket TCP_NODELAY to true when connecting to RPC server. The default is true.

property.name: rpc.client.max.idle
property.description: Max idle time of a RPC connection in milliseconds. Default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.ping.interval
property.description: Interval, in milliseconds, at which the RPC client sends a heartbeat to the server. Set this property to 0 to disable the heartbeat. The default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.timeout
property.description: The timeout interval, in milliseconds, that the RPC client uses when trying to set up the connection. The default is 600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.retry
property.description: The maximum number of times that the RPC client will retry after failing to set up the connection to the server. The default is 10.

property.name: rpc.client.read.timeout
property.description: The timeout interval, in milliseconds, for when the RPC client is trying to read from the server. The default is 3600000 (1 hour).

property.name: rpc.client.write.timeout
property.description: The timeout interval, in milliseconds, for when the RPC client is trying to write to the server. The default is 3600000 (1 hour).

property.name: rpc.client.socket.linger.timeout
property.description: Determines the timeout interval to set for the socket SO_LINGER when connecting to the RPC server. A value of -1 means to use the default OS value. The default is -1.

property.name: yarn.client.failover.max.attempts
property.description: If multiple resource managers are configured, the maximum number of RPC calls that a yarn client will retry to issue. The default is 15.
